name: Solano County Housing Authority
description: Section 8 housing vouchers for Solano County residents
fullDescription: The Housing Authority of the County of Solano administers Section 8 vouchers and affordable housing programs for low-income residents in Solano County.
whatTheyOffer:
- Section 8 Housing Choice Vouchers
- Public housing
- Project-based vouchers
- VASH vouchers for homeless veterans
- Family self-sufficiency program
howToGetIt:
1. Check HACS website for waitlist status
2. Apply when waitlist opens
3. Must meet income limits
4. Solano County residents get preference
5. Wait for name on waitlist
address: 1 Harbor Center, Suite 200, Suisun City, CA 94585
keywords: Solano Housing Authority, Section 8, housing voucher, Fairfield, Vallejo, Vacaville, low-income, waitlist
